input.sentences: location location was such a peaceful place the morning of july 4 .
we barbecued an entire pig in the afternoon and partied with family and friends .
sadly | the night turned ugly as the fireworks on the beach set some nearby brush on fire .
the fire quickly got out of control .
who would have thought that something as beautiful as this could turn so ugly ?
output.sentences: It all started wih a beautiful peaceful morning during our trip.
We went sight seeing and visited a local market cooking food.
Sudenly there was a huge fire in the distance.
The fire spead rapidly but luckily locals were finally able to get it under control and put it out.
That night there was a celebration after the scare of the fire with fireworks lighting up the night sky.
